    • Field Detail

      • DIRECT_EXECUTOR

        public static final Executor DIRECT_EXECUTOR
        A default Executor to use when executing CompletableFuture callbacks which simply executes the callback in the netty event loop. This Executor should only be use when you can be sure your callback code never blocks.
